news.content:
Following up on recent news:


We wanted to share the demo of how to deploy ownCloud on top of the ThreeFold Grid â€“ which was first showcased to the ownCloud ecosystem this Monday at ownCloud Conference 2021.


The demo itself starts at 13:30, and takes under ten minutes.
news.excerpt: Following up on recent news, learn more about ownCloud and ThreeFold and see a live demo.
